Package io.github.zero88.jooqx.mutiny

Interface SQLStatementExecutor

public interface SQLStatementExecutor
Represents for an executor that executes SQL statement

NOTE: This class has been automatically generated from the original non Mutiny-ified interface using Vert.x codegen.

    • getDelegate

      SQLStatementExecutor getDelegate()

    • execute

      @CheckReturnValue <T, R> io.smallrye.mutiny.Uni<R> execute(Function<org.jooq.DSLContext,org.jooq.Query> queryFunction, SQLResultAdapter<T,R> resultAdapter)
      Execute jOOQ query then return async result

      Unlike the bare Vert.x variant, this method returns a Uni. Don't forget to subscribe on it to trigger the operation.

      Parameters:
      queryFunction - the jOOQ query function
      resultAdapter - the result adapter
      Returns:
      the uni firing the result of the operation when completed, or a failure if the operation failed.

    • executeAndAwait

      <T, R> R executeAndAwait(Function<org.jooq.DSLContext,org.jooq.Query> queryFunction, SQLResultAdapter<T,R> resultAdapter)
      Blocking variant of execute(Function,SQLResultAdapter).

      This method waits for the completion of the underlying asynchronous operation. If the operation completes successfully, the result is returned, otherwise the failure is thrown (potentially wrapped in a RuntimeException).

      Parameters:
      queryFunction - the jOOQ query function
      resultAdapter - the result adapter
      Returns:
      the R instance produced by the operation.

    • executeAndForget

      <T, R> void executeAndForget(Function<org.jooq.DSLContext,org.jooq.Query> queryFunction, SQLResultAdapter<T,R> resultAdapter)
      Variant of execute(Function,SQLResultAdapter) that ignores the result of the operation.

      This method subscribes on the result of execute(Function,SQLResultAdapter), but discards the outcome (item or failure). This method is useful to trigger the asynchronous operation from execute(Function,SQLResultAdapter) but you don't need to compose it with other operations.

      Parameters:
      queryFunction - the jOOQ query function
      resultAdapter - the result adapter
